CustomField.description: This holds the value of the last OOO Start Date that we successfully processed. This field gets written to by the batch class. It is also used to query when doing the OOO reschedule rollback.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This holds the value of the last OOO Start Date that we successfully processed. This field gets written to by the batch class. It is also used to query when doing the OOO reschedule rollback.
CustomField.label: Processed Out of Office Start Date
